org.jdiscript.util

Class VMLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdiscript.util.VMLauncher

  • public class VMLauncher
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VMLauncher(java.lang.String options, java.lang.String main)
      Create a VMStarter that uses the given options and main class to launch a process for debugging.
      VMLauncher(java.lang.String options, java.lang.String main, boolean killOnShutdown, java.io.OutputStream out, java.io.OutputStream err)
      Alternate constructor giving control over the initialization of a shutdown hook that attempts to kill the created VM when the debugging VM dies.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VMLauncher

        public VMLauncher(java.lang.String options,
                  java.lang.String main)
        Create a VMStarter that uses the given options and main class to launch a process for debugging. By default, this initializes a shutdown hook that attempts to kill the created VM when the debugging VM dies. To override this behavior, use the alternate constructor.
        Parameters:
        options -
        main -
